main_definition: Buffing refers to the act of polishing or smoothing a surface, typically using an abrasive substance or tool.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Slacking off at work or school
meanings_and_examples.example: Instead of studying for his exams, John decided to just be buffing around the office.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Spending time aimlessly without any purpose
meanings_and_examples.example: She was all day just buffing around town, not really doing anything in particular.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An activity where individuals engage in leisurely pursuits or hobbies
meanings_and_examples.example: After work, he likes to go for a run and then spend some time buffing on his guitar playing.
